actions.description: The cradle makes two Slam or Spit Rock attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.
actions.name: Spit Rock

actions.description: The cradle lets out a painfully load roar. Each creature within 60 feet of the cradle must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Shattering Roar (Recharge 5-6)

conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone
name: Cradle of the Stone Scion [BGG]
resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The cradle is a container for the scion of Skoraeus|BGG. When the cradle drops to 0 hit points, its body crumbles to dust. The scion instantly appears in the space the cradle occupied and uses the cradle's initiative count.
specialTraits.name: Awakening of the Scion

specialTraits.description: If the cradle fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)

specialTraits.description: The cradle has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: The cradle deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster
